Song.title: Know You
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Steve & Vikki Cook © 2001 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [Dm]Come and shine Your Sp[C]irit’s light U[Bb]pon these darkened e[F]yes [C/E] [Dm]Once again rev[C]eal Your majes[Bb2]ty [ | Bb2] May [Dm]I behold the s[C]plendor of The g[Bb]reat redeeming [F]Lamb [C/E] The [Dm]One whose wondrous g[C]race{,} possesses m[Bb F/A]e [Gm7]Lord [Bb/F]how I am l[Csus]onging [| C]
Chorus: ‘Cause I want to k[Dm7]now Y[Bb2 | C F]ou And the [Dm7]love that [Bb2]passes [C]compre[F]hension [Dm7]Know [Bb2 | C F]You [ ]and the [Gm7]power [Dm7]of the [Csus]cross [C]I want to [Dm7]know [Bb2 | C F]You And the [Dm7]glory [Bb2]of Your [C]resur[F]rection [Asus]Lord [A] [ ]I’m [Dm]crying [C]out for [Bb2 | Csus ]more [C |]of [Dm | C | Bb2 | Bb2]You
Verse 2: [Dm]Come and open [C]up my ears To [Bb]hear Your glorious [F C/E]truth [Dm]Lord Your words{,} are [C]my soul’s very l[Bb2 | Bb2]ife For [Dm]I consider ev[C]erything{,} in[Bb] this world as a [F C/E]loss Com[Dm]pared to You{,} my t[C]reasure and del[Bb F/A]ight [Gm7]Lord [Bb/F]how I am l[Csus]onging [| C]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 come and shine your spirits light upon these darkened eyes once again reveal your majesty may i behold the splendor of the great redeeming lamb the one whose wondrous grace possesses me lord how i am longing chorus cause i want to know you and the love that passes comprehension know you and the power of the cross i want to know you and the glory of your resurrection lord im crying out for more of you verse 2 come and open up my ears to hear your glorious truth lord your words are my souls very life for i consider everything in this world as a loss compared to you my treasure and delight lord how i am longing
